general_info.summary: This document appears to be a navigation or index listing of various sections and programs offered by Sharda University. It includes academic schools such as Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, and Nursing Science & Research. It also lists administrative and operational items like examination reports, the Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, university brochures, and information about tenders, statutes, and ordinances. Additionally, it highlights student development initiatives related to capacity building, language skills, soft skills, innovation, entrepreneurship, and even mentions FM radio and international campus locations.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths available after completing a nursing course, including roles like Nursing Incharge, Nursing Executive, Assistant Nursing Superintendent, Nursing Supervisor, and Paramedic Nurse. It also highlights that students from this program can expect an average annual salary package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA, encouraging individuals to pursue a nursing career.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Nursing Incharge
• Nursing Executive
• Assistant Nursing Superintendent
• Nursing Supervisor
• Paramedic Nurse
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in nursing.
